document.full_text: florida lawmakers on thursday sent republican governor rick scott a pair of national rifle association-backed measures, including one that would bar physicians from asking most patients if they have guns in their homes.
document.title: florida lawmakers aim to limit doctor questions on guns
lines_and_colors: florida lawmakers on thursday sent republican governor rick scott a pair of national rifle association-backed measures, including one that would bar physicians from asking most patients if they have guns in their homes.
